data_findings.finding: bbox3 binary optimizer with -n (iterations) and -r parameters. fix_direction optimizes rotation angle to minimize bounding box. Phased approach: Phase A (short runs 2min), Phase B (medium 10min), Phase C (long 20min). Uses repair_overlaps_in_place to fix overlapping trees.

saspav kernel combines "Why Not" by jazivxt and "Santa 2025 - fix direction" by Stanislav Chistyakov. Uses bbox3 binary optimizer with fix_direction post-processing. Replaces overlapping groups with donor file.

bbox3.cpp is a C++ optimizer with: Complex Number Vector Coordination, Fluid Dynamics, Hinge Pivot, Density Gradient Flow, Global Boundary Tension. Uses aggressive_repair for overlap resolution. Key parameters: -n (iterations), -r (rounds). Uses OpenMP for parallelization.

santa-claude kernel uses tree_packer_v21.cpp with: Swap moves, Multi-angle restarts, Higher temperature SA, Backward propagation (bp.cpp). Key parameters: -n (iterations), -r (rounds). Uses squeeze, compaction, localSearch. bp.exe removes trees from larger configs to improve smaller ones.

Getting started notebook: Greedy placement algorithm - places trees at random angles, moves toward center until collision, backs up. Uses weighted angle distribution (abs(sin(2*angle))) to place more trees in corners. ChristmasTree class with 15-vertex polygon (trunk + 3 tiers).
